description: This file defines FastAPI routes for managing subscription plans, subscribing to plans, making payments, and retrieving user subscriptions within a movie streaming application backend.

classes.name: APIRouter
classes.description: Framework class used to define a router that groups related API endpoints.

methods.name: list_plans(db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Endpoint to retrieve all active subscription plans.

methods.name: create_plan(payload: PlanCreate, current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user), db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Endpoint to create a new subscription plan, restricted to admin users.

methods.name: subscribe_to_plan( plan_id: int, current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user), db: Session = Depends(get_db), )
methods.description: Endpoint for a user to subscribe to a specific plan.

methods.name: make_payment( payload: PaymentCreate, current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user), db: Session = Depends(get_db), )
methods.description: Endpoint to perform payment for a subscription.

methods.name: list_my_subscriptions(current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user), db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Endpoint to list all subscriptions of the current user.

ctags.name: create_plan
ctags.pattern: /^def create_plan(payload: PlanCreate, current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user), db: Session/
ctags.signature: (payload: PlanCreate, current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user), db: Session = Depends(get_db))

ctags.name: list_my_subscriptions
ctags.pattern: /^def list_my_subscriptions(current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user), db: Session = Depends(/

ctags.name: make_payment
ctags.signature: ( payload: PaymentCreate, current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user), db: Session = Depends(get_db), )

ctags.name: subscribe_to_plan
ctags.signature: ( plan_id: int, current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user), db: Session = Depends(get_db), )
